title: Catweather
descr: A weather application that displays funny cats dressed according to current weather conditions, featuring worldwide location search, light and dark themes, responsive design, and real-time weather data powered by the OpenWeather API.

title: Headless Wordpress Shop
descr: A compact e-commerce website built with Headless WordPress/WooCommerce as a backend. The project features a modern MUI design, efficient product search, dark & light theme, optimized for both desktop and mobile devices

title: Age Counter
descr: Web application that accurately calculates a user's age based on their birthdate. It displays the exact time elapsed since birth (years, months, days, hours, minutes). Supports multiple languages, light & dark themes and a fully responsive design.

title: Carpathian Herbs Shop
descr: E-commerce store featuring category-based sorting, popular products, a shopping cart, multilingual support with language switching, light and dark themes, and a custom user interface fully designed and crafted by me, with responsive layout and modern UX patterns.

title: Honey Shop
descr: Small e-commerce web application with smooth animations, demonstrating essential features commonly found in online stores, enhanced by an original visual design fully created and implemented by me, featuring a fully responsive layout across devices.

title: Compremont
descr: Computer and smartphone repair workshop website with a carousel slider showcasing key services, subtle interface animations, a fully responsive design across devices, and an integrated contact form for customer inquiries and feedback.

title: Food spin
descr: Website layout design based on a free template, featuring a spinner carousel used as an interactive menu for dish selection, complemented by dynamic interface animations and a fully responsive layout across different screen sizes.
